issue.title: www.instagram.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.instagram.com/accounts/login/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.instagram.com%2Faccounts%2Flogin%2F) ### Comment > У вас проблемы с инстаграм. Сначала отключил блокировщик рекламы браузера Опера, проблема остался, потом включил это обратно, отключил блокировку адгуард на этой странице и все сработала, видно нормально, когда адгуард отключен. Фильтры обновил, антивируса и вирусов нету, так как это линукс. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adtidy.org/sitereports/t006egqmsq8s40gowcs0k8gcsssoo80t7hy6nchvv4.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://cdn.adtidy.org/sitereports/1ebtrd52jy4g8kw0ww4so4sgk008kowqugnxp12ea8.png?nc=1)

Send Do-Not-Track header,
Strip URLs from tracking parameters,

Block WebRTC,
Hide your Referrer from third-parties Filters: | Ad Blocking:

comment.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.tango.me/following](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.tango.me%2Ffollowing) ### Comment > Steps: > > 1. Visit https://www.tango.me/following > 2. Click on Login > 3. The click on "Continue with Google" > 4. You will observe that the Google login window does not open. > > Checked with AG disabled and enabled. When AG is disabled, the window appears to login to with Google account. ### Screenshots
